alert.note: Alert for Garvin; Grady; McClain (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 12 at 5:42PM CDT until May 12 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Garvin County in southern Oklahoma... Southeastern Grady County in central Oklahoma... Southwestern McClain County in central Oklahoma... * Until 630 PM CDT. * At 542 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Bradley, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Purcell, Lindsay, Maysville, Washington, Alex, Bradley, Criner, Payne, and Erin Springs. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
